YUZU:Accumulation.NAME: Accumulation
YUZU:Accumulation.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the number of cards in your deck.
YUZU:Accumulation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal damage equal to the number of cards in your deck.
YUZU:Accumulation.FLAVOR: Can I smash the card deck to someone else?

YUZU:AimingPreparation.NAME: Aiming Preparation
YUZU:AimingPreparation.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, fill !M! yuzu:CritSlot. NL yuzu:Master: Whenever you play a yuzu:Mastered card, fill 1 yuzu:CritSlot.
YUZU:AimingPreparation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you play a card, fill !M! yuzu:CritSlot. NL yuzu:Master: Whenever you play a yuzu:Mastered card, fill 1 yuzu:CritSlot.
YUZU:AimingPreparation.FLAVOR: If we can move out 30 meters, this should be a qualified combat location.

YUZU:Analysis.NAME: Analysis
YUZU:Analysis.DESCRIPTION: At this combat, whenever you play a card, yuzu:Master all cards of the same type. Whenever you play a yuzu:Mastered card, Exhaust it.

YUZU:AonengShooting.NAME: Aoneng Shooting
YUZU:AonengShooting.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain !M! Strength or Dexterity. NL yuzu:Crit: Gain 1 Strength or Dexterity.
YUZU:AonengShooting.FLAVOR: The bullet hits the monster and gives back a strange feeling, can this simple shooting really make me stronger?

YUZU:BeMercifulToOthers.NAME: Show Mercy
YUZU:BeMercifulToOthers.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Cannot kill monster.

YUZU:BriefSilence.NAME: Brief Silence
YUZU:BriefSilence.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to not attack, Stun the target and clear yuzu:CritSlot. NL yuzu:Master: Clear yuzu:Crit. NL Exhaust.

YUZU:Cabinet.NAME: Cabinet
YUZU:Cabinet.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Other cards in your hand are changed to not yuzu:Mastered.

YUZU:Camouflage.NAME: Camouflage
YUZU:Camouflage.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL yuzu:Master: At this combat, autoplay it when you draw this card.
YUZU:Camouflage.FLAVOR: In fact, as long as you open it and take a glance, this clumsy disguise will be exposed.

YUZU:Claustrophobia.NAME: Claustrophobia
YUZU:Claustrophobia.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have no Block, deal again. NL If the target has no Block, deal again.

YUZU:ClumsyRolling.NAME: Clumsy Rolling
YUZU:ClumsyRolling.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards, Discard !M! card. NL yuzu:Master: Discard first.
YUZU:ClumsyRolling.FLAVOR: Maybe fell on back while playing around.

YUZU:ColdStorage.NAME: Cold Storage
YUZU:ColdStorage.DESCRIPTION: Put !M! card from your draw pile into your hand. NL These cards are Retain and Unplayable.

YUZU:ColdTouch.NAME: Cold Touch
YUZU:ColdTouch.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak, Deal !D! damage. NL yuzu:Master: Swap the values of Weak and damage. NL yuzu:Crit: The target lose 1 Strength.
YUZU:ColdTouch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak, Deal !D! damage. NL yuzu:Master: Swap the values of Weak and damage. NL yuzu:Crit: The target lose 2 Strength.

YUZU:CollaborativeShooting.NAME: Collaborative Shooting
YUZU:CollaborativeShooting.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! DAMAGE. NL Deal !M! additional damage for all yuzu:mastered cards.
YUZU:CollaborativeShooting.FLAVOR: Friends can always help you, including in a non conventional sense.

YUZU:ConcentratedShooting.NAME: Concentrated Shooting
YUZU:ConcentratedShooting.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL yuzu:Crit/ yuzu:Master: Increase !M! % Crit damage.

YUZU:Condensation.NAME: Condensation
YUZU:Condensation.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 card in you hand. NL Its cost increase 1 and get "Play it again". NL yuzu:Master: It get " yuzu:Master: play it again".

YUZU:CoverShooting.NAME: Cover Shooting
YUZU:CoverShooting.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, Gain !B! Block. NL yuzu:Master: Exhaust.
YUZU:CoverShooting.FLAVOR: There are only two portable shelters, it won't take long.

YUZU:CoverTheSmokeScreen.NAME: Smoke Screen Cover
YUZU:CoverTheSmokeScreen.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak to ALL. NL Gain !B! Block.
YUZU:CoverTheSmokeScreen.FLAVOR: The range of smoke bombs is too large, it is inevitable that user will also be affected.

YUZU:CurlUp.NAME: Curl Up
YUZU:CurlUp.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a *IronBox into your hand.
YUZU:CurlUp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, add a *IronBox into your hand.

YUZU:DesignShooting.NAME: Design Shooting
YUZU:DesignShooting.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to the first enemy directly ahead.

YUZU:EnergyCycle.NAME: Energy Cycle
YUZU:EnergyCycle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, gain [E] . NL yuzu:Crit/ yuzu:Master: Gain [E] .
YUZU:EnergyCycle.FLAVOR: This type of attack almost fires energy blocks directly...The perception of the combination of bullets and batteries is still too far away.

YUZU:Estimate.NAME: Estimate
YUZU:Estimate.DESCRIPTION: View top 5 cards of your draw pile, choose !M! types to add to your hand.
YUZU:Estimate.FLAVOR: Calm down, everything is under control.

YUZU:ExtremeMeasures.NAME: Extreme Measures
YUZU:ExtremeMeasures.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards, Exhaust overflow drawing cards. NL yuzu:Master: yuzu:Master overflow drawing cards instead of Exhaust. NL Exhaust.
YUZU:ExtremeMeasures.FLAVOR: Everyone must know the principle of repaying the price.

YUZU:FlameModule.NAME: 火焰模块
YUZU:FlameModule.DESCRIPTION: 在回合开始时，给予所有敌人 !M! 层 yuzu:燃烧 。
YUZU:FlameModule.FLAVOR: 与火焰喷射器配布的头套，不知道为什么很安全，可以给个十分。

YUZU:ForkedIntersection.NAME: Forked Intersection
YUZU:ForkedIntersection.DESCRIPTION: Choose !M! times: Gain 1 Strength; Gain 1 Dexterity; Gain 7 Block; Draw 1 card.

YUZU:FragmentedBomb.NAME: Fragmented Bomb
YUZU:FragmentedBomb.DESCRIPTION: 将 !D! 点伤害随机分配给所有敌人。 NL yuzu:暴击 ：再打出一次。

YUZU:GameStart.NAME: Game Start!
YUZU:GameStart.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. This card gain additional 1.5 times Crit damage. NL yuzu:Master: This card will definitely yuzu:Crit.
YUZU:GameStart.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. This card gain additional 1.75 times Crit damage. NL yuzu:Master: This card will definitely yuzu:Crit.
YUZU:GameStart.FLAVOR: The most commonly startup move, and the signature move of uzqueen.

YUZU:Gifts.NAME: Heatr Gifts
YUZU:Gifts.DESCRIPTION: Randomly add 3 cards with Retain into your hand.

YUZU:GiveBestShot.NAME: 尽力一击
YUZU:GiveBestShot.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害， 消耗 手牌中的其他牌。 NL yuzu:精通 ：改为 消耗 手牌中的其他攻击牌。

YUZU:GlowBlessing.NAME: Glow Blessing
YUZU:GlowBlessing.DESCRIPTION: You will not lose HP and negates any debuff, until the start of the next round. NL Exhaust.

YUZU:Grenade.NAME: 小型榴弹
YUZU:Grenade.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害，给予 !M! 层 yuzu:燃烧 。

YUZU:HighPrecisionOperation.NAME: High precision operation
YUZU:HighPrecisionOperation.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! cards in your hand. NL yuzu:Master: If you Exhaust Skill, play their copies.
YUZU:HighPrecisionOperation.FLAVOR: Keep your eye, this is a technique that your cannot learn in Kivotos.

YUZU:HighSpeedCycle.NAME: HighSpeed Cycle
YUZU:HighSpeedCycle.DESCRIPTION: Randomly add !M! cards from your discard pile, return them to not yuzu:Mastered. NL yuzu:Master: Choose cards yourselt, not randomly.

YUZU:Image.NAME: Straw Doll
YUZU:Image.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !m! Temp_HP. When the Temp_HP is broken, escape from non Boss combat.
YUZU:Image.FLAVOR: It seems that living people are always the ultimate targets of monsters' attacks.

YUZU:Inversion.NAME: Inversion
YUZU:Inversion.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Other cards in your hand get "yuzu:Master: Exhaust."
YUZU:Inversion.FLAVOR: Should we tear up paintings first, or clear the program first?

YUZU:IronBox.NAME: Iron Box
YUZU:IronBox.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. Clear yuzu:CritSlot. NL Exhaust.

YUZU:JobResponsibilities.NAME: Job Responsibilities
YUZU:JobResponsibilities.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL All *Strike and *Defend get "yuzu:Master: Play again."
YUZU:JobResponsibilities.FLAVOR: Today's bug hasn't been fixed yet.

YUZU:Loopback.NAME: Loopback
YUZU:Loopback.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL yuzu:Master: Add 1 same name card from your draw pile.

YUZU:MaliciousDesign.NAME: Malicious Design
YUZU:MaliciousDesign.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, Transform Strength to equal Vigor. NL Exhaust.
YUZU:MaliciousDesign.FLAVOR: "Momoi, isn't this a bit too bad...?"

YUZU:MemoryRetention.NAME: 记忆留存
YUZU:MemoryRetention.DESCRIPTION: 将消耗堆的牌返回抽牌堆。 NL 消耗 。 NL yuzu:精通 ：改为交换你的手牌和消耗牌堆。（有bug别用，问就是麻烦懒得改，之后再弄）

YUZU:MicroBlasting.NAME: Micro Blasting
YUZU:MicroBlasting.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Apply Vulnerable equals to unblocked damage dealt. NL yuzu:Master: Then apply Weak equals to unblocked damage dealt.
YUZU:MicroBlasting.FLAVOR: Even if this word is used to describe blasting, this behavior can still harm people.

YUZU:Naturalization.NAME: Naturalization
YUZU:Naturalization.DESCRIPTION: Randomly add !M! yuzu:Mastered cards into your draw pile. Their costs are 0, and get Exhaust. NL yuzu:Master: Draw 1 card when you play one of them. NL Exhaust.
YUZU:Naturalization.FLAVOR: I have played too many games.

YUZU:NovicePickUp.NAME: Memory Master
YUZU:NovicePickUp.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! cards of 0 cost into your hand. NL yuzu:Master: Change to add random cards, which cost 0 in this turn.
YUZU:NovicePickUp.FLAVOR: "Yuzu is probably just good at playing games, I haven't heard of her talent for using weapons." - Momoi.

YUZU:OpenTheDoor.NAME: Open The Door
YUZU:OpenTheDoor.DESCRIPTION: Innate. Deal !D! damage, Upgrade all cards in your hand.

YUZU:Paintings.NAME: Sky Painting
YUZU:Paintings.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, after drawing, gain [E] equals to #b%d times the number of card types in your hand. NL Ethereal.
YUZU:Paintings.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, after drawing, gain [E] equals to #b%d times the number of card types in your hand.
YUZU:Paintings.FLAVOR: Midori seems to have used only one stroke to draw... But isn't rainbow has seven colors?

YUZU:Polarization.NAME: Polarization
YUZU:Polarization.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 card to add a copy into your hand. The card is returned to not yuzu:Mastered. NL yuzu:Master: No longer return it to not yuzu:Mastered state. NL Exhaust.
YUZU:Polarization.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Choose 1 card to add a copy into your hand. The card is returned to not yuzu:Mastered. NL yuzu:Master: No longer return it to not yuzu:Mastered state. NL Exhaust.
YUZU:Polarization.FLAVOR: It seems to be able to summon demons, angels, dragons, and the like.

YUZU:PotentialExplosion.NAME: 潜能爆发
YUZU:PotentialExplosion.DESCRIPTION: yuzu:暴击 也会应用到技能牌上，表现为多打出1次。yuzu:精通：

YUZU:Preheat.NAME: Preheat
YUZU:Preheat.DESCRIPTION: Fill yuzu:CritSlot to the full immediately. The yuzu:Crit damage increase !M! %. NL yuzu:Master: Reduce 2 upper limit of yuzu:CritSlot.
YUZU:Preheat.FLAVOR: Preheating does not refer to heat previously, so the sight will not heat up.

YUZU:PressureArmor.NAME: Pressure Armor
YUZU:PressureArmor.DESCRIPTION: When you lose HP next time，gain !B! Block and !M! Blur immediately.
YUZU:PressureArmor.FLAVOR: If there were no attack restrictions, this shield could be deployed anytime and anywhere.

YUZU:ProperPlanning.NAME: Proper Planning
YUZU:ProperPlanning.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, choose !M! cards to get Retain.
YUZU:ProperPlanning.FLAVOR: Next time should go to campfire to rest... it's better.

YUZU:Refraction.NAME: Refraction
YUZU:Refraction.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 card to add X copies with Retain into your hand. yuzu:Master: X is 2.
YUZU:Refraction.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 card to add X+1 copies with Retain into your hand. yuzu:Master: X is 2.

YUZU:ScorchingExplosive.NAME: 灼燃爆弹
YUZU:ScorchingExplosive.DESCRIPTION: 对所有敌人造成 !D! 点伤害，给予所有敌人 !M! 层 yuzu:燃烧 。 NL yuzu:精通 ：在本场战斗中，同名牌造成的伤害和给予的 yuzu:燃烧 增加 !B! 。这张牌可以无限次的被 yuzu:精通 。
YUZU:ScorchingExplosive.FLAVOR: 烟尘似乎正是下颗榴弹爆炸的催化物。

YUZU:SelfRepair.NAME: Self Repair
YUZU:SelfRepair.DESCRIPTION: At this combat, reduce X upper limit of yuzu:CritSlot. NL yuzu:Master: a random Power in your hand cost 0 before being played.
YUZU:SelfRepair.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At this combat, reduce X+1 upper limit of yuzu:CritSlot. NL yuzu:Master: a random Power in your hand cost 0 before being played.
YUZU:SelfRepair.FLAVOR: Leave the ribbon there, it's too torn - luckily the outside of this garment is quite thick.

YUZU:Shadow.NAME: 幽寂之影
YUZU:Shadow.DESCRIPTION: 给予所有单位 !M! 层 易伤 ， 虚弱 。 NL yuzu:精通 ：改为清除自身的所有状态。

YUZU:ShootingPreparation.NAME: Shooting Preparation
YUZU:ShootingPreparation.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! Attack cards. The card cost highest cost 0 before being played. NL Exhaust.
YUZU:ShootingPreparation.FLAVOR: Bullets that automatically load are pleasing.

YUZU:Skilled.NAME: Skilled
YUZU:Skilled.DESCRIPTION: Add all yuzu:mastered cards into your hand from your draw pile. NL yuzu:Master: Gain [E] .
YUZU:Skilled.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add all yuzu:mastered cards into your hand from any pile. NL yuzu:Master: Gain [E] .
YUZU:Skilled.FLAVOR: First time strangers, second time friends.

YUZU:Solidifying.NAME: Solidifying
YUZU:Solidifying.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. The left and right cards of this card are also Retain.
YUZU:Solidifying.FLAVOR: "Yuzu, it's time to do laundry, change it.""Th-There is no need..."

YUZU:SpreadShooting.NAME: Spread Shooting
YUZU:SpreadShooting.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, apply !M! Vulnerable. If you have no Strength, gain 1 Strength and Exhaust this card.
YUZU:SpreadShooting.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, apply !M! Vulnerable. If you have no Strength, gain 2 Strength and Exhaust this card.
YUZU:SpreadShooting.FLAVOR: You saw the bright flames attached to the blade, and the red haired girl seemed to nod.

YUZU:StandShield.NAME: Stand Shield
YUZU:StandShield.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. NL yuzu:Master: The Block of this card is reduced by 25%.

YUZU:StrategyAnalysis.NAME: Strategy Analysis
YUZU:StrategyAnalysis.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Block from the enemy. Remove all of your debuffs. NL Exhaust. NL yuzu:Master: Then use all your [E] to remove the Strength from the enemy.
YUZU:StrategyAnalysis.FLAVOR: "Strategy? But I don't even know what it is! ""Calm down, observe first..."

YUZU:TemporarySupply.NAME: Temporary Supply
YUZU:TemporarySupply.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Temp_HP. NL yuzu:Master: changed to Heal HP.
YUZU:TemporarySupply.FLAVOR: Chocolate, bread, and water...When did you buy them?

YUZU:VulturesEye.NAME: Vultures Eye
YUZU:VulturesEye.DESCRIPTION: This turn, the requirement of yuzu:CritSlot is reduced to 3. NL yuzu:Master: changed to gain !M! Crit.
YUZU:VulturesEye.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This turn, the requirement of yuzu:CritSlot is reduced to 2. NL yuzu:Master: changed to gain !M! Crit.
YUZU:VulturesEye.FLAVOR: The eagle eye has eight times the visual acuity of humans. Its eyes have a special structure and a unique visual system that can magnify objects several times, similar to the principle of a telescope.

YUZU:Spark.NAME: 流星火花
YUZU:Spark.DESCRIPTION: 给予 !M! 层 yuzu:燃烧 X次。
YUZU:Spark.FLAVOR: 一闪而过的火花绽放成雨，或是凝结成束，散发光彩。

YUZU:Medicine.NAME: Dangerous Medicine
YUZU:Medicine.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, apply !B! Block. NL yuzu:Master: Swap the value of damage and Block. This card can be yuzu:mastered any number of times.
YUZU:Medicine.FLAVOR: It's also strictly forbidden in the spire. Is it really necessary to use it to myself?

YUZU:EmergencyEnergy.NAME: Emergency Energy
YUZU:EmergencyEnergy.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E]. NL Whenever you play a yuzu:mastered card, play this card in your draw pile.
YUZU:EmergencyEnergy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E]. NL Whenever you play a yuzu:mastered card or a card triggered a yuzu:Crit, play this card in your draw pile.
YUZU:EmergencyEnergy.FLAVOR: I'm not sure what effect this broken battery will have, be careful.

YUZU:DoubleJump.NAME: Double Jump
YUZU:DoubleJump.DESCRIPTION: Draw 2 cards. If the effect of the last card played includes drawing cards, draw cards until the hand is full.
YUZU:DoubleJump.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Draw 2 cards. If the effect of the last card played includes drawing cards, draw cards until the hand is full.
YUZU:DoubleJump.FLAVOR: Last second jump was supported by Momoi, Midori and Aris.

YUZU:EnergyConversion.NAME: Energy Conversion
YUZU:EnergyConversion.DESCRIPTION: Swap yuzu:Crit times and [E] now. NL Exhaust.
YUZU:EnergyConversion.FLAVOR: Energy is the most complex thing in the world.

YUZU:SlowBurn.NAME: 野火燎原
YUZU:SlowBurn.DESCRIPTION: 给予所有敌人1层 yuzu:燃烧 ，并将所有敌人的 yuzu:燃烧 层数翻 !M! 倍，在手牌中添加1张 *灼伤 。 NL 消耗 。
YUZU:SlowBurn.FLAVOR: 会烧到自己，不过敌人已经快被烧化了，你觉得受这点烫伤也挺值。

YUZU:AlternativeOptions.NAME: Alternative Options
YUZU:AlternativeOptions.DESCRIPTION: The cost of all cards with Retain in your hand is reduced by 1. NL yuzu:Master: Exhaust this card, changed to reduce cost by 1 for all cards in your hand.

YUZU:ImpactWarhead.NAME: Impact Warhead
YUZU:ImpactWarhead.FLAVOR: This type of warhead will shoot the monster far away, you have enough time to load it slowly.

YUZU:FireWarning.NAME: Fire Warning
YUZU:FireWarning.DESCRIPTION: Fill yuzu:CritSlot until you get 1 yuzu:Cirt. NL yuzu:Master: changed to fill !M! yuzu:CritSlot.
YUZU:FireWarning.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Fill yuzu:CritSlot until you get 2 yuzu:Cirt. NL yuzu:Master: changed to fill !M! yuzu:CritSlot.
YUZU:FireWarning.FLAVOR: Just a crude adjective, seeing you load shells, others have already run away.

YUZU:Barter.NAME: Barter
YUZU:Barter.DESCRIPTION: Discard one potion and randomly obtain a rarer one. NL Exhaust.
YUZU:Barter.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard one potion and randomly obtain a rare potion. NL Exhaust.
YUZU:Barter.FLAVOR: The only thing that can be put on the balance with death, is onlt death -- It's a bit off topic.

YUZU:AdvanceShooting.NAME: Advance Shooting
YUZU:AdvanceShooting.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, draw !M! cards, lose [E] . NL If the energy is 0 when playing this card, Exhaust it.
YUZU:AdvanceShooting.FLAVOR: It's generally believed that this design is foolish: high cost, and disposable. Is it really necessary to use it?

YUZU:LinearSegmentation.NAME: Linear Segmentation
YUZU:LinearSegmentation.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. If there are two or more enemies with the same name, the damage dealt increases !M! .
YUZU:LinearSegmentation.FLAVOR: The current segmentation technology is not perfect, but it can still be used for experimentation.

YUZU:Blast.NAME: 燃焰爆破
YUZU:Blast.DESCRIPTION: 每打出一次暴击就使 yuzu:燃烧 的基础数值提高 !M! 。

YUZU:Fortress.NAME: Doomsday Fortress
YUZU:Fortress.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] [E] and !B! Block. NL You cannot yuzu:Crit in the rest of this combat. NL Master: Lose 1 Strength and Dexterity. NL Exhaust.

YUZU:Climax.NAME: Climax
YUZU:Climax.DESCRIPTION: Choose one: Draw cards or Gain [E], equals to the count you draw this card. NL yuzu:Master: Reset the count to 0.
YUZU:Climax.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Choose one: Draw cards or Gain [E], equals to the count you draw this card. NL yuzu:Master: Reset the count to 0.
YUZU:Climax.FLAVOR: It's time to get hyped, but we're still in the warm-up phase.

YUZU:Span.NAME: Span
YUZU:Span.DESCRIPTION: Clear yuzu:CritSlot, each yuzu:CritSlot makes you gain [E]/ Draw 1 card alternately. NL Exhaust.
YUZU:Span.FLAVOR: "Can this thing be used as a bridge?"

YUZU:KillingInstructions.NAME: Killing Instructions
YUZU:KillingInstructions.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain Vigor equals to 50% of the unblocked damage dealt.
YUZU:KillingInstructions.FLAVOR: "Aris, are you sure?""Just trust in the precision of high-mechanical-accuracy cameras."

YUZU:FinallyIHope.NAME: Final Hope
YUZU:FinallyIHope.DESCRIPTION: Gain an additional turn. At the start of this turn, lose [E] [E] and draw less 3 cards. NL Exhaust.
YUZU:FinallyIHope.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain an additional turn. At the start of this turn, lose [E] and draw less 2 cards. NL Exhaust.

YUZU:MagazineFilling.NAME: Magazine Filling
YUZU:MagazineFilling.DESCRIPTION: The yuzu:Crit dagame increase 25%. NL At the end of your turn, each Retain card will fill !M! yuzu:CritSlot.
YUZU:MagazineFilling.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The yuzu:Crit dagame increase 50%. NL At the end of your turn, each Retain card will fill !M! yuzu:CritSlot.
YUZU:MagazineFilling.FLAVOR: Shell loading is not fun at all, as it means they are about to take action...

YUZU:GamingField.NAME: Gaming Field
YUZU:GamingField.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a not #yMasterd card, gain !M! Block.

YUZU:AmmunitionFilling.NAME: Ammunition Filling
YUZU:AmmunitionFilling.FLAVOR: Maybe I should take a nap.

YUZU:FoldUpClothes.NAME: Clothes Shields
YUZU:FoldUpClothes.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Draw !M! card cost 1. NL yuzu:Master: Play 1 *Defend in your hand.
YUZU:FoldUpClothes.FLAVOR: Good thing I wore the hard armor. Sometimes, just folding it a bit is enough to block.

YUZU:Leveraging.NAME: Leveraging
YUZU:Leveraging.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Gain Vigor equals to your Strength. NL At the end of this turn, lose !M! Strength.
YUZU:Leveraging.FLAVOR: "Did you learn this from a fighting game?"--Midori

YUZU:ManaPotion.NAME: Mana Potion
YUZU:ManaPotion.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] for each card that cost 2 or higher in your hand.
YUZU:ManaPotion.FLAVOR: As everyone knows, you can't use abilities without mana.

YUZU:KillAbsolutely.NAME: Kill Absolutely
YUZU:KillAbsolutely.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, eliminate a random enemy.
YUZU:KillAbsolutely.FLAVOR: No sympathy should be shown to the enemy's living forces.

YUZU:Shanhai.NAME: Pai Shan Dao Hai
YUZU:Shanhai.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Strength affects extra times equals to the cost of Attack.

YUZU:EmergencyProtection.NAME: Emergency Protection
YUZU:EmergencyProtection.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all Retain cards in your hand. NL Discard your hand. NL Gain !B! Block.

YUZU:TestCode.NAME: Test Code
YUZU:TestCode.DESCRIPTION: Put !M! card from your draw pile into your hand. NL This card back to draw pile.
YUZU:TestCode.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Put !M! card from your draw pile into your hand. NL This card back to draw pile.

YUZU:SimplifiedCombo.NAME: Simplified Combo
YUZU:SimplifiedCombo.DESCRIPTION: Choose up to !M! cards. Then choose one: Convert into *Strike+X; Convert into *Defend+X. NL These converted cards cost 0. NL Exhaust.

YUZU:ConcealingToPeople.NAME: Concealing To People
YUZU:ConcealingToPeople.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Only the intent of the target will take effect in next monster turn. NL Exhaust.

YUZU:SimplifiedLoading.NAME: Simplified Loading
YUZU:SimplifiedLoading.DESCRIPTION: Increase 2 upper limit of yuzu:CritSlot. NL Increase !M! % Crit damage.

YUZU:ChainReaction.NAME: Chain Reaction
YUZU:ChainReaction.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL When this card is yuzu:Mastered, draw 2 cards.

YUZU:ExperienceStripping.NAME: Experience Stripping
YUZU:ExperienceStripping.DESCRIPTION: Choose !M! yuzu:Mastered cards, turn them to not yuzu:Mastered. NL Add !M! *Experience to your hand.
YUZU:ExperienceStripping.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose !M! yuzu:Mastered cards, turn them to not yuzu:Mastered. NL Add !M! *Experience+ to your hand.

YUZU:Experience.NAME: Experience
YUZU:Experience.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL yuzu:Master !M! cards. NL Exhaust.
